name: AfroEights
description:
Remember Crazy Eights? Whot? Switch? We've given them an African Twist! Enjoy hours of fun and laughter, playing and reconnecting with our Afro Eights Game!  This online multiplayer version of Crazy Eights features the AfroEights Playing Cards and uses the rules of Crazy Eights as played in Africa.

  • Crazy Eights with African Rules 
  • Play Against Anyone Anywhere 
  • Also on Android and iOS 
  • Play Free Now and Forever - A benefit of being a part of our Beta Test!
